problem_text_cn: 如图是拦水坝的横断面,斜坡AB的水平宽度AC为6米,斜面坡度为1:2,则斜坡AB的长为()
problem_text_en: The picture shows the cross section of the dam, the horizontal width AC of the slope AB is N_0, and the slope of the slope is N_1:N_2, then the length of the slope AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:过点B作BC⊥AE于点C,在Rt△ABC中,∵i$=\frac{BC}{AC}=\frac{1}{2}$,AC=6米,∴BC=3米,根据勾股定理得:AB$=√{AC^{2}+BC^{2}}=√{6^{2}+3^{2}}=$3$√{5}$(米),故选:B．
